text: a baludu ataniki toduga srama ceyagala vayas'suku cerukunnappudu, atanu (ibrahim) annadu: "O na kumara! Vastavaniki nenu ninnu bali (jibah) cestunnatluga kalalo cusanu, ika ni salaha emito ceppu!" Atanu (ismayil) annadu: "O nanna! Niku ivvabadina ajnanu neravercu, allah korite nivu nannu sahanasiluniga pondagalavu
